Back to Alban Berg

Alban Berg

Ganze Stücke

c. 1905–1906

Total duration: 12' 30"

  • 1. E major
  • 2. C major
  • 3. Walzer in F minor
  • 4. C major
  • 5. E major
  • 7. Impromptu in C minor

The numbering of these pieces is as given by Berg; it is not known whether the sixth piece is lost or was never written.

Recommended editions

  • Sämtliche Werke (Universal Edition) · II/1 · UE 18172a · Kompositionen aus der Studienzeit, Teil 1 · ed. Rudolf Stephan
  • Universal Edition · UE 18145 · Frühe Klaviermusik / Heft 1 / Ausgewählte Stücke · ed. Rudolf Stephan [nos. 5 and 7]

1. E major

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. C major

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Walzer in F minor

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

4. C major

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

5. E major

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5

7. Impromptu in C minor

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5
